tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_segmentation_data (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    segment VARCHAR(20),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    last_purchase_date DATE,
    total_spent DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  purchase_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_segments (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50),
    segment_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE targeted_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_id INT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE promotion_data (
    promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    promotion_type VARCHAR(50),
    discount_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
    customer_id INT,
    preference_name VARCHAR(50),
    preference_value VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id, preference_name)
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerProfiles (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  customer_segment VARCHAR(20),
  customer_age INT,
  customer_gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  purchase_date DATE,
  purchase_category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE PromotionHistory (
  promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  promotion_type VARCHAR(30),
  promotion_description TEXT,
  promotion_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_rating INT,
  feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE CampaignTracking (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
  campaign_type VARCHAR(30),
  campaign_start_date DATE,
  campaign_end_date DATE
)
